title: [Icemule Trace, Exterior]
description: Trodden paths have muddied the snow between the clumped edges of snowbanks formed from the constant clearing of walkways buried beneath each fresh fall.  Sunlight glares off the quilt of white that covers the ground and sparkles like crushed diamonds.

Trodden paths have muddied the snow between the clumped edges of snowbanks formed from the constant clearing of walkways buried beneath each fresh fall.  Moonlight illuminates the quilt of white that covers the ground and sparkles like crushed diamonds.
